de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt
Class BTDebugUtils

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.BTDebugUtils

public class BTDebugUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Some simple utils for debugging: If you use this methods, after you have finished, you can easiely find all uses of this methods(with eclipse) and delete them fast. This makes sure, you don't forget some debug output.

Author:
Jan Stolzenburg

checkAssert

public static final void checkAssert(boolean theAssertion)
Use this method for asserts. The java build in asserts are normaly turnd off and therefore useless.

Parameters:
theAssertion - The assertion you make.

checkAssert

public static final void checkAssert(boolean theAssertion,
                                     java.lang.String theMessage)
Use this method for asserts. The java build in asserts are normaly turnd off and therefore useless.

Parameters:
theAssertion - The assertion you make.
theMessage - The message that will be printed, if the assertion fails.
